channel.title: Sujal Gupta's Newsletter
channel.description: Weekly newsletter about technology, programming, and developer insights

item.title: Welcome to My Newsletter!
item.description:
Hello and welcome to my newsletter! I'm excited to share regular updates about technology, programming, and insights from my journey.

What you'll get:

  • Weekly tech updates
  • Programming tutorials
  • Project showcases
  • Career tips for developers

Stay tuned for the first edition coming soon!

item.title: Building a Newsletter System with Cloudflare
item.description:
Learn how I built a complete newsletter system using Cloudflare Workers, D1 database, and GitHub Pages.

Key features:

  1. Automated RSS feed checking
  2. Email subscription management
  3. Bot protection with Turnstile
  4. Scheduled newsletter sending

Perfect for developers wanting to start their own newsletter!

item.title: JavaScript Tips for 2024
item.description:
Essential JavaScript tips and best practices for modern web development.

  • New ES2024 features
  • Performance optimization techniques
  • Async/await patterns
  • Common pitfalls to avoid

Level up your JavaScript skills with these practical tips!
